StringProperty.Name: RemoteFile
StringProperty.Description: Specifies where to copy the file on the remote system. The option overrides the default name and location of the file on the remote system.

BoolProperty.Name: RemoteCopyFile
BoolProperty.Description: Specifies whether to copy the file on the remote system.

BoolProperty.Name: RemoteCopyToOutputDir
BoolProperty.Description: Specifies whether to also copy the file to the output project directory on the remote system.
